content:
1. I am a 22-year-old woman.
2. I have a basic understanding of what sexual lubricants are but I haven't used one before.
3. No, I haven't used lubricant before.
4. I haven't considered purchasing lubricant before, but I would look at the ingredients and price.
5. No, I haven't seen advertisements for lubricants before.
6. Yes, I think lubricants are important for sexual experiences because they can make the experience more comfortable and enjoyable.
7. I am a bit uncomfortable discussing and buying lubricants, I prefer to buy it online.
8. I have not seen any advertisement yet so it did not influence my opinion about lubricant.
9. I haven't used a lubricant before so I couldn't rate my overall satisfaction with it.
10. I couldn't recommend a lubricant to my friends and family as I haven't used one before.
